DOC.brief_summary: This study perform observe incidence major cardiovascular event Korean patient AMI give pitavastatin 2mg 4mg longer 1 year .
DOC.brief_title: Livalo Acute Myocardial Infarction Study ( LAMIS )
DOC.criteria: Patients STEMI , NSTEMI Patients satisfy least one follow 1 . Patients LDLC ≥ 130 mg/dL 2 . Patients LDLC ≥ 100 mg/dL regard require cholesterol lower therapy investigator 3 . Patients take statin require continuous cholesterol lower therapy Patients satisfy least two following 1 . The change Ischemic ECG 2 . CK , CKMB , TroponinI increase two time 3 . The symptom ACS 1 . Patients instent restenosis PCI coronary artery bypass 2 . Patients cardiogenic shock 3 . Patients severe heart failure ( Left ventricular ejection fraction le 30 % ) 4 . Patients take cyclosporine 5 . Patients experienced hypersensitivity pitavastatin 6 . Patients dialysis treatment 7 . Patients participate clinical trial 8 . Patients stop take concomitant drug 9 . Pregnant lactate woman suspect pregnancy 10 . Patients regard ineligible study investigator
